info.name: Azure Hyperlight
info.description:
Azure Hyperlight is a Fantasy Adventure/Obby world created by G Universe Studio into the Theme for Roblox Website, Compatible both Roblox Dark and Light theme.




This work is Attribution Noncommercial NoDerivatives. You may not use this for any of your or other commercial projects, 
remix, transform or build upon the material, you may not distribute the modified material and You must give appropriate credit, 
provide a link to the license, and indicate if changes were made.
info.additionalInfo:
V. R.1.0_5 - 10/15/2019
- Removed unnecessary text-shadow on some element due to some translated text are hard to read on
- Add text color on some element that wasn't changed in V. R1.0 (Localization Section)
- Start to support some "Roblox+ Extensions" element

V. R1.0 - 10/7/2019
- Fixed カタログ(Catalogs) word Where グ out of the top bar area
- Theme is now compatible with Roblox both Dark and Light theme
*If theme still say "Azure Hyperlight (Alternate)" this is completely normal*

V.1.0
-Officially Released
